title: EP 112  Of Mice And Men
itunes:title: EP 112  Of Mice And Men
description:
In this episode we have a conversation with the homeboy "Melle Mel The Hood Professor" and discuss what the criteria of being a solid man is and where we may have went wrong. We then have an in depth conversation with Tobin Costin, the former CEO of Master P's No Limit Records. We discuss the early days of the iconic label and how P almost wound up on Big Beat/Atlantic records.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
